input.sentences: sometimes the best weddings are informal expressions of love .
our friends attended | but in relaxed clothes | so everyone could enjoy themselves .
pretty comes from happiness and fun | a joyful face and favorite dress .
we shared food and drink to celebrate .
we all felt so close | like i was holding meaning in the palm of my hand .
output.sentences: My easy going hippy parents have finally decided to formally get married.
It was an informal affair so we didn't have to get dressed up or put on a show.
Here is mom and her friend relaxing after the ceremony.
Getting ready for the cake to be cut.
A picture of dad's hand as he gets ready for the symbolic joining of palms ceremony.
